# awscc_ec2_egress_only_internet_gateway (Resource)

Resource Type definition for AWS::EC2::EgressOnlyInternetGateway

## Schema

### Required

- **vpc_id** (String) The ID of the VPC for which to create the egress-only internet gateway.
